title: Storm at sea, tornado on land

abstract: 'Something hit a pole outside, and then another crash, as a huge piece of corrugated iron came out of nowhere.'
description: As Kelly Lennon ate breakfast, she knew it was going to be a miserable day. What followed was so terrifying that it was only when her mother returned that she felt safe. On the 3rd of June 2010, the residents of Lennox Head, on the North Coast of New South Wales, were preparing for the day ahead when their town was struck by a tornado.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002419; Living with disaster 2 : Digital Storytelling project; Active; 2010
